Trade/Device Name(s): S TEST Reagent Cartridge Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Kinetic test (UV rate) with urease and glutamate dehydrogenase (BUN)
Enzymatic reaction with creatinase, creatininase, sarcosine oxidase, peroxidase; formation of quinone pigment (CRE)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for S TEST Reagent Cartridge systems for BUN and creatinine assays on the Hitachi Clinical Analyzer E40.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of blood urea nitrogen (BUN) and creatinine in serum and specified plasma types for aiding in diagnosis and treatment of renal and metabolic diseases, and monitoring renal dialysis, on the Hitachi Clinical Analyzer E40 in clinical and physician office laboratories.
